Drop Outdated Job Postings

05 Feb 2000

Being an upwardly mobile kind of guy, I occasionaly look at the Jobs section of the Evolt site.

One thing I have noticed is that some of the postings are several months old.

How about checking for old (2-3 months) postings, and deleting them?
